name: Turn Up the Base Full Beat Waterproof Liquid Foundation
about: What it is:u00a0A long-wear, waterproof, sweatproof foundation formulated with only 16 ingredients that gives full coverage and maximum comfort to visibly blur and smooth without clogging pores...Coverage:u00a0Full.Finish:u00a0Matte.Formulation:u00a0Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:u00a0- Lauroyl Lysine: An amino acid that prevents makeup breakdown and provides water and sweat resistance..- Alkane Complex: 100 percent plant-derived emollients replace silicone for a smooth feel..- Rice Silk Powder: Blurs skin with a soft-focus effect...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: A full beat reimagined. Transform the complexion with weightless full coverage that looks as good as it feels. This foundation is formulated with amino acid lauryol lysine to prevent makeup breakdown while 100 percent plant-derived emollients replace silicone for a soft-matte finish that hugs skin all day. It is dermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic, and suitable for sensitive skin...Clinical Results: In a consumer perception study, 94% agreed:.- The foundation provides full coverage.- The foundation feels super comfortable to wear.- The foundation applies smoothly onto skin
ingredients: -Lauryl Lysine: An amino acid that prevents makeup breakdown and provides water and sweat resistance..-Alkane Complex: 100 percent plant-derived emollients replace silicone for a smooth feel. .-Rice Silk Powder: Blurs skin with a soft-focus effect. ..Water (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Lauroyl Lysine, C13-15 Alkane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, C9-12 Alkane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Magnesium Sulfate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopherol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Hull Powder. May Contain/Peut Contenir (u00b1):  Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake well before use..-Pat and press into skin with fingers, sponge, or brush.  ..Patrick Starrr pro tips: .-The intentionality of this 16-ingredient formula allows full beat to layer with all types of primers. .-The soft-matte finish can be set and customized to your preference with ONE/SIZE by Patrick Starrru2019s Ultimate Setting Powder and On u2018Til Dawn Mattifying Waterproof Setting Spray as desired (each sold separately).

reviews.review_text: Where has this been all my life? This gives me FULL coverage with a skin-like finish that lasts literally all day. Even my husband noticed and said u201cI think this makeup youu2019re wearing is the one!It doesnu2019t sink into my pores on my nose like other foundations I usually use. I am officially obsessed. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this couple of weeks, I will say full coverage matte makeup. Throughout time I get real oily and it keeps it in there. I just brought this one size on a whim and Iu2019m satisfied. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A few thoughts on this after wearing it for two 12 hour days. I can see this being fantastic for summertime, but for the dry colder months itu2019s dried me out and also has broke me out just slightly. But we canu2019t reasonably expect a full coverage all day perfecting foundation to not dry us out! At the beginning to the end of 12 hours, my makeup looked so good!! Oils came through a tiny bit after 6 hours of wear, not bad at all. I used primer and a luminous powder. This reminds me of estee lauder double wear but less matte/flat. I do enjoy it for when I need that perfect complexion and for my makeup to LAST. However I find the price point to be a miss with how much product there is. Iu2019m excited to try it in the summer time during those insanely humid days, I think itu2019ll be great. I have combo skin and double moisturized underneath this (esp with it being winter) as well. I do recommend trying it! I just prefer it cosmetics cc foundation for these cold months.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s good but beware before you buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturize really well or it will sit on top of your skin . I have oily skin.. During the winter I still had to moisturize really good for the foundation to sit well  and then a spray prep .. try not to use a  mattifying primer if you use a powder. .. unless you like the heavy look. Use half a pump and then build. The color matches are off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hhade range is awesome. Got the perfect for my skin tone. Unfortunately, this foundation is super drying on my skin. I have combination skin. It makes my face look super patchy, and you can see my pores. It dries down way too fast for a good blending unless you super work fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a replacement for the discontinued Laura Mercier Flawless Fusion foundation in Macadamia. I thought I would be a light color in this foundation, but Fair 50 NG ended up being the closest match. A couple of the light shades were actually lighter than Fair 50, which was the best match for my skin tone although it was a bit too light. The foundation has enough coverage. My oily t-zone was still oily after a few hours and my dry areas looked dry. All of that might have been ok; however, the foundation made me break out. I wore it a few times, days to a week apart, and broke out each time. I now have two scars from that and canu2019t wear this again. This was unfortunate and surprising since foundations my skin doesnu2019t usually react this way. It may work well for others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this foundation! It is the perfect match to my skin, even down to the rosy undertone! It feels like skin when I put it on. Doesnu2019t feel cake, and a little goes a long way! For me, it best pairs with a water based primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for 2 months, Iu2019m obsessed!!! I use this more than any other foundation and I even get compliments on my makeup. I do have oily combo and I use the tarte pore-less primer.

reviews.review_title: WOW finally a non toxic foundation that works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After reading reviews I was hoping this was gonna be  The foundation It is indeed not .. you have to layer it quite a bit and it instantly comes off my nose. If I touch my face in the slightest the makeup comes off all the way. I have tried with 3 different primers , setting powder , setting spray but its going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been searching for an alternative to my rudely-discontinued all-time favorite foundation, KVD Lock-It. Nothing people recommended to me as a dupe even came close. I loved how the KVD was *actually* full coverage (unlike a lot of foundations that claim to be), it looked gorgeous on the skin, it lasted beautifullyu2026 It was pretty perfect for my wants and preferences, and I was genuinely upset when they discontinued it lol.  You guys, this is the closest Iu2019ve found. If youu2019re a full coverage, obvious-makeup-wearing girly, this is so good!! *Actually* full coverage, beautiful soft matte finish, blurring on the skin, lasts throughout the dayu2026 Of course, it is a full coverage foundation, so itu2019s not going to be weightless or invisible on the skin. That being said, I do think it does a fantastic job sitting nicely on the skin for a foundation of itu2019s coverage level.  I finallyyyyy feel like I can have my old full beat makeup style back and Iu2019m so happy about it ud83eudd72 If you, like me, were crushed when they discontinued Lock-It, give this one a try! I think youu2019ll love it.  One note: the shades run very golden. I had to buy a rosy shade (Iu2019m usually neutral) because everything else looked superrrrr golden/warm on me.

reviews.review_text: I kept getting samples until I decided to get the full size. This has turned into my favorite foundation. I have mature skin and it doesnu2019t sink into my fine lines and my large pores. This has turned into a holy grail for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this foundation.  I was seeing glowing reviews of this foundation all over the internet.  I should have known this was not meant for me when I first bought the shade, Fair 20R.  It was literally dried out.  There was no fluidity.  I returned it and didn't look at the shade I exchanged it for, Fair 30 N.  It was the consistency that it was supposed to be.  I was excited until I tried it on.  No matter what I did, what primer I used, what application/tool I used, the results were still the same.  This foundation immediately began to cling to any imperfection.  When I tried to smooth it would with a brush or beauty blender, it just completely left my face in that spot.  When I finally got the result decent enough, I wore it to work.  Throughout the day, it was pilling and separating and clinging to dry spots.  It completely settled in the pores in my nose area and did not dry down.  I couldn't touch anything to my face.  By the end of the day, it looked like I took a makeup wipe and did a terrible job of wiping my face.  I returned it.

It feels good on too.  I was a little worried it was too yellow based when I first applied it but after a short time it blended well.

Will have to return with a completely broken heart and continue my search.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't write reviews, but this foundation is truly amazing. I have dry skin, so I was worried when I saw it was matte, but it is perfect. It covers all my pores and doesn't dry out my skinu2014quite the opposite, actually. In a couple of hours, I have a light sheen, and my foundation looks like skin. FYI, I use Tarte shape tape concealer and Kosas powder for my base, for anyone who wants to know what it looks good with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is extremely oily. Of all the foundations Iu2019ve tried this wears the best. On me this wears even better than Double Wear- which is a holy grail for me. I prep my skin with a hydrating spf, matte setting spray, and then blend this with a sponge. Itu2019s so good! At the end of the day I look glowy but the foundation doesnu2019t separate or crease up. Iu2019m impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was SO EXCITED to try my first One Size beauty product because I love Patrick sm!! But this foundation was so disappointing. I have oily skin so I usually go for matte foundations. This seemed like it would be my holy grail but unfortunately it didnu2019t work for me. The foundation was patchy and cakey.!! I tried blending with a brush and with a sponge and got the same result. I made sure to follow patricku2019s instructions and tips but it didnu2019t make the application any better. Had to return. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I made some mistakes that make this foundation separates, way too yellow, heavy. And the mistakes are the following: I used an oil based face cream, a brush, then I try to work it with a damp sponge.  Terrible! So, for me was better to use a dry sponge, water based face cream or gel texture, and work the product in the sponge before apply it in the face. After that, never looked yellow, cakes,or separate. Hope this helps! This  foundation is a HIT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am SO glad I decided to try this!  Stunning finishu2026lasting foundation. Obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has really good coverage, and a pretty finish. Itu2019s not too matte, but not dewy, a satin finish. It lasts a while on me with the Fenty primer. The shade I chose isnu2019t too red, but not ashy. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have issues with large pores and blemishes and my make up not lasting for more than 2 hours. It usually settles into my pores. I had the foundation on for over 6 hours and it still looked fresh! A little goes a long way with coverage and blends so easily.

reviews.review_title: Not good for dry.. oily... who is it good for?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Color match was great, but this was horrible. I tried water based primers to match the water base of this foundation, then I tried my tried and true silicone based, did my full skin prep, and it was still bad. Tried different applications with the One Size sponge or my BK beauty brushes. Clings to every pore and natural crease on the face. Makes my super oily skin feel dry. Usually even if a foundation dries down matte because my skin is so oily it will actually soften and settle after an hour and look good; this only got worse with time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is full coverage and blends beautifully. It feels so lightweight and smooth on the skin. Wears great for long hours also

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I wanted to try a foundation that didnu2019t make me look like a sweaty mess. I have really dry/sensitive skin so I have to prep my skin really good with my skincare. I was using more hydrating foundations such as Haus Labs and Nars but I noticed in pictures I looked waaay too hydrated even with using setting powders. Iu2019m loving the finish with One Size, I build it to medium coverage and glad I decided to go with a foundation with a semi matte finish. Because I prep my skin well and I also apply with a damp beauty sponge, this doesnu2019t accentuate dry patches, fine lines and I do find it blurring which is great being that Iu2019m in my late 30s. I also enjoy the fact that there isnu2019t a bunch of unnecessary (in my opinion) skincare ingredients in the foundation, I already have a good skincare routine so I donu2019t need extra ingredients in my makeup. It looks very skin like to me and has a natural finish, which is very pretty but again, not matte. My Fenty Matte foundation is a true soft matte and this finish is nowhere near that.   I do love that it has a smaller list of ingredients. My sensitive skin doesnu2019t break out from it which is great! And it does last a verryyyy long time.  Overall, the foundation is nice but the color range and the finish makes it so that I have to work a bit harder to make it work for me.
